td.a: Department of Elementary and Secondary Education (DESE)

a.aria-label: Show All links and Link Categories

td.br: The Norborne R-VIII school board will not meet in April in response to the current COVID-19 situation.

td.a: Free Breakfast and Lunch Delivery During C-19 Closing
td.br: All Norborne students, regardless of lunch status, are eligible for a free breakfasts and lunches during the COVID-19 closure. Both meals will be delivered between 9 and 10:00. Meals will be left outside the door to reduce contact between delivery team and families. Please complete this form to sign up for meals. Click headline to display form.
